devdoc.author: Iain Nash @isiain
devdoc.details: Contract for Algo Light Project by @jawn

constructor.details: Sets up the serial contract with a name, symbol, and an initial allowed creator.

params._maxAvailableId: Max number that can be minted beyond 0
params.name: Name of NFT contract

isApprovedMinter(address).details: Returns if given address is an approved minter or owner

params.minter: address of potential minter to test

mint(address).details: Authenticated mint function that mints a random available NFT

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setApprovedMinters(address[]).details: Admin owner-only function to update the list of approved minters

params._approvedMinters: list of addresses that are approved minters

tokenURI(uint256).details: Returns tokenURI for given token that exists

params.tokenId: id of token to retrieve metadata for

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
